## random letter

Generates a random letter

### Synopsis

Generates a random latin letter in the range of a-Z and A-Z.

```
random letter [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help    help for letter
  -l, --lower   output lowercase letter.
  -u, --upper   output uppercase letter.
```
